trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design para controles de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner> provides design-time rendering of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner> Fornece processamento de tempo de design de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> controles.

trans-unit.source: It includes support for editable designer regions, templates, and auto-formats to allow a page developer to easily alter the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Inclui suporte para designers editáveis, modelos e formata automaticamente para permitir que um desenvolvedor de página alterar facilmente a aparência do controle.

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collections provide quick formatting options for the page developer and can be safely overridden to change the default appearance of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: O público <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> coleções fornecem opções de formatação rápidas para o desenvolvedor de página e pode ser substituídas com segurança para alterar a aparência de padrão de um controle personalizado.

trans-unit.source: If you want to override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> method to change the design-time appearance of your custom control, make sure to use <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> and invoke the parent method before adding custom code, because that is the method that creates the rendering for the regions in the control.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> método para alterar a aparência de tempo de design do seu controle personalizado, certifique-se de usar <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> e invocar o método pai antes de adicionar o código personalizado, porque esse é o método que cria o processamento para o regiões no controle.

trans-unit.source: If you override <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> and do not call <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> somewhere in the method, your designer regions will not be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> e não chame <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> em algum lugar no método, as regiões de designer não serão processadas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de esquemas de formatação automáticos e predefinidos a serem exibidos na caixa de diálogo **Autoformatação** do controle associado no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A pre-specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> with a default WebPartZone scheme.
trans-unit.target: Previamente especificado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> com um esquema de WebPartZone padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property overrides its base implementation to return a collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> propriedade substitui a sua implementação base para retornar uma coleção que é específica para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para representar o controle no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time by calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> method with a null argument.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para representar o controle no tempo de design, chamando o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> com um argumento nulo.

trans-unit.source: A method call to <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> with a null argument as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada de método para <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> com um argumento nulo como o parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method, you must call <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> or <see langword="null" /> as an argument so that designer regions build correctly.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir esse método, você deve chamar <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> com um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> ou <see langword="null" /> como um argumento para que o designers regiões compilado corretamente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" />, if any, associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" />, se houver, associada ao controle.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> in the designer before generating the design-time HTML of the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> no designer antes de gerar o HTML em tempo de design do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the design-time HTML of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o HTML em tempo de design do controle.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method, you must call the base method for designer regions to build correctly.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir esse método, você deve chamar o método base para regiões de designer para criar corretamente.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the content for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conteúdo da <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the persisted form of the designer region content.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o formulário persistente do conteúdo da região do designer.

trans-unit.source: Provides an empty string ("") if there is no design-time HTML for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Fornecerá uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("") se não houver nenhum HTML em tempo de design para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: An empty string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the designer to the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Anexa o designer ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the content for the specified region.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o conteúdo para a região especificada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the content of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o conteúdo da <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de grupos de modelos, cada uma contendo uma ou mais definições de modelo.

trans-unit.source: A pre-specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> object with default settings for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone" /> environment.
trans-unit.target: Previamente especificado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> objeto com configurações padrão para um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone" /> ambiente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property overrides its base implementation to returns a collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> propriedade substitui a sua implementação base para retornar uma coleção que é específico para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> classe.
